body.name: SAXX Men's Underwear - Sport Mesh Boxer Brief - 2 Pack

byLineInfo.name: Visit the SAXX Underwear Co. Store

features: Origin Made in the USA or Imported
SPORT MESH BOXER BRIEFS 2 PACK: Made from a lightweight micro-mesh, this 2 pack of boxer briefs is hard working men’s underwear designed for all day, every day comfort.
SLIM FIT: Ideal for wearing under sweats or gym gear, these form fitting boxer briefs are perfect for layering, and the moisture wicking underwear is designed with a 5” seam and fly.
BALLPARK SUPPORT: Our boxer briefs come equipped with the patented BallPark Pouch to reduce friction and keep your man-parts in place with breathable mesh panels for chafe-free comfort.
BUILT-IN TECH: This underwear has a Three-D Fit for complete ergonomic comfort, and Flat Out Seams to prevent irritation. The easy-care boxer briefs are machine wash and tumble dry for zero hassle.

SAXX MEN’S UNDERWEAR: Creating high quality men’s underwear to support guys in driving positive change in the world, we design game-changing underwear for men who are constantly challenging the status quo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saxx Sport Mesh Boxer Brief size large - Feel good, slightly snugger fit.
reviews.reviewText: I have one other pair of Saxx boxer briefs (Quest) which fit well and when I saw the sport mesh boxer for a reasonable price I decided to give them a try. The fabric is very light and has plenty of stretch. The pouch keeps your balls in place as advertised. These are slightly snugger across the hips than the other pair I have but it does provide slightly more lift and support for your balls without being uncomfortably tight. I've worn them to the gym a couple of times and am happy with them. The waist fits slightly lower than the other pair I have but they don't feel like they are sliding down while being worn. The legs do tend to ride up a bit more, but they don't seem to bunch or create creases in the groin that are uncomfortable. Overall I'm happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband loves them
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my husband because he wanted a little more support for the boys. These are soft, supportive, and comfort. I know they can be a little pricey but well worth the cost due to the quality. Plus my husband's happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Support with the Fly - Better SAXX boxers
reviews.reviewText: Have tried several models of the SAXX boxers, these are my favorite. Great for riding (motorcycle), appreciate the fly and little creep for the legs. Waist band is secure, ahhhhh. Easy to wash and quickly dry. Size runs a bit small, they are SLIM fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice support, but size runs to larger size
reviews.reviewText: Nice fit overall, but runs to the larger size.I will buy again, but hesitant on size for the cost.I'll wait for sale and buy a smaller size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortability is Amazing
reviews.reviewText: my boyfriend raves about these briefs so much I got him a pair for xmas. He absolutely loves this brand and is very good quality. 10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Boxer Brief!
reviews.reviewText: I usually wear low-rise underwear or thong but decided to give the SAXX Sports Mesh Boxer Brief a try. I was not disappointed at all! The sport mesh fabrics feels fantastic on the skin and the built-in pouch was a welcome surprise. Your balls are nestled in place and everything else feels right. I wore the boxer brief all day and even though I did not work out, they never felt like athletic underwear. Great design and comfort! Would order these again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: my underwear journey..... i bought some basic inexpensive undies from walmart and it felt as if i was just going commando, very very displeased and i ended up donated that pack of 6 into the donation box. sure when i was younger i would not care, but now i am older and support matters. i haul mail and have to get in and out of the truck a lot and realized that the right underwear can really provide comfort all day long. this pair of saxx seems ok as far as support goes. as some mentioned it does fit rather tight and i have never worn speedos before but i am guessing this probably has a similar tight feeling and i got a medium. some mentioned that the back of the underwear falls down and while i will half agree that they probably bought the wrong size, i will say that the front seems to pull up higher than the back. not sure if that is by design or not, but it did not bother me. the material is nice and comfy. now the reason why this underwear is not for me is because it squeezes the scrotum in really tight and because i get in and out of the seat and walk around a lot things get pushed down and when i get back into the seat it feels like everything is crammed down and i have to reach inside and down to pull things up so i can sit comfortably. yes it does prevent things from moving left and right but as far as doing the things that matter, there are other brands that are more cost effective and do just as well. i will still use it, until i find the one with the support i really need, but i will not buy this model again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gave theses to my son for Christmas and he seemed pleased to have them as a gift.
My husband reports the new material is nice and breathable but has the disadvantage of sliding down.

reviews.reviewTitle: Like a comfy hammock to keep them in place
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my partner after hearing so many times from family, friends, TikTok that these are the last brand of undies men will buy/wear. My partner said it was like a comfy hammock keeping him in place. And they were the best fitting undies he has tried. Although a little on the pricier side, these seem like good quality and have the “hammock” that other undies don’t have. I will definitely be buying more of these for my guy. Love the different prints.
Ni una rozadura, nunca. Hago ultramaratones y no me atrevo a entrenar sin mis saxx. Impresionante .
Sehr bequeme Laufshorts die die Sachen da halten wo sie hingehören. Ankommen ohne Wolf und nicht mehr schmieren ist das höchste für jeden männlichen Läufer.
El producto no ha llegadoEste producto nunca me llegó y ahora me dicen que paso el tiempo para devolver o cancelar..Really
